comments:
The device server console received the following DB2 Sql errors when Aperi brought  up Inband Fabric agent at build Aperi-20070311-190942.zip, it seems the build had regressed the fix of 174837.

DELETE FROM T_VIEW_HOST2PORT WHERE HOST_ID = ?
INSERT INTO T_VIEW_HOST2PORT SELECT PORT_ID, HOST_ID, HOST_URL FROM T_VIEW_HOST2
PORT_TEMP2 WHERE HOST_ID = ?
INSERT INTO T_VIEW_HOST2PORT SELECT PORT_ID, HOST_ID, HOST_URL FROM T_VIEW_HOST2
PORT_TEMP1 WHERE (PORT_ID NOT IN (SELECT PORT_ID FROM T_VIEW_HOST2PORT_TEMP2)) A
ND HOST_ID = ?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 172220 ***
Reopen the defect 177038, the error still exists in the latest nightly build of Aperi-20070329-191750.zip
The problem had been fixed by configuring Aperi db during db create time. Tested on Aperi-20070417-192015.zip build
